# Project Tech Stack
- React
- Vite
- TypeScript
- ShadCN
- Figma MCP Server 
- Figma Link (Open this one with Figma MCP Server global! Don't use external browser to open this figma link): https://www.figma.com/design/frcB56zxdOmIM0gcLZziPh/Om-SEHAT?node-id=0-1&t=v6gyQF8bKOoRl3O5-1

# Project Structure
- `src/`: Contains all the source code for the project.
  - `components/`: Reusable UI components.
  - `pages/`: Page components that represent different routes.
  - `styles/`: Global styles and ShadCN configuration.
  - `utils/`: Utility functions and helpers.
  - `hooks/`: Custom React hooks.
- `assets/`: Static assets like images and icons.
- `public/`: Publicly accessible files, including the main HTML file.

# Development Guidelines
- Build the frontend based on the provided Figma design using FIGMA MCP Server.
- Use functional components and hooks for state management.
- Follow the component-based architecture.
- Write clean, maintainable code with proper comments.
- Use TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience.
- Use Figma MCP Server for design assets and references.
- Use ShadCN for styling components.
- Make a documenation on README.md and Dockerfile.

# Take a note
- If you got stopped when you are coding the project, please check the Figma MCP Server for design assets and references. Also continue the work from the last job you do before the continue to iterate. 
- If you have problems and lack of information, please ask on the Copilot Chat.
